title: Film-Noir | The Hoodlum (1951) by Max Nosseck | Colorized | Full Movie

sources.title: Film-Noir | The Hoodlum (1951) by Max Nosseck | Colorized | Full Movie
sources.description:
One-way road to the chair for today's greatest menace!
Vincent Lubeck is a vicious ex-convict. His criminal activities are despised by his family, but he uses and abuses them in the course of his crimes. Eventually his own brother must stand up to him.

Original title: The Hoodlum (1951) 

Black & White version: https://youtu.be/fbyBnELwad4


This film is available with subtitles in many languages.

Director: Max Nosseck
Writers: Sam Neuman, Nat Tanchuck 
Stars: Lawrence Tierney, Edward Tierney, Allene Roberts, Marjorie Riordan
Genres: Crime, Drama, Film-Noir


00:00 Full Movie
00:59 Johnny's brother, Vincent Lubeck is granted parole after serving time in prison, but faces challenges in adjusting to his new life outside.
10:04 Vincent is released from prison and plans to work at the gas station with Johnny.
16:50 Vincent, meets Eileen and plans a heist involving an armored car.
29:51 Rosa's pregnancy leads to a tragic outcome for Johnny and Vincent.
35:46 During a funeral procession, two men plan to rob a bank but are foiled by the police.
43:46 Lubeck is involved in a series of crimes, including a bank robbery, and is being pursued by the police.
53:37 Confronting Father about the pain and suffering he caused, leading to a tragic ending.
